title: FS: T205 SGC graded lot of 23 w/Matty, Speaker, 5 other HOFers
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: FS: T205 SGC graded lot of 23 w/Matty, Speaker, 5 other HOFers
posts.post_content:
I've lost my motivation to put together this set so offering  23 SGC graded T205s (actually Matty is BVG 3). 
I'm including scans of Matty, Speaker, and Baker but I'll be glad to send you scans of any individual cards. These all have nice eye appeal, even the low grade ones. Happy to answer any questions at [url]javanbrigham@verizon.net[/url]

Cards priced individually below with paypal (gift) or add 3% for regular paypal.

BVG 3 Christy Mathewson-$400

SGC 40

Frank Schulte-SOLD
James Sheckard-SOLD
Clyde Milan-$32
Larry Doyle-$32
Thomas Leach-SOLD
Ed Reulbach-$32
Ed Konetchy-$32
SGC 30

Tris Speaker-$200
Frank Baker-$SOLD
Kitty Bransfield-$26
Sam Leever-$26

Charles Herzog-$26
Howie Camnitz-$26

SGC 10

Jake Daubert (minor pinhole)-$20
Eddie Collins mouth closed (creasing does not affect face area)-$45

SGC A
Zach Wheat (trimmed but great eye appeal)-SOLD
Lower prices. Happy to send scans if you would like to see something.

Email sent!
( In another moment of weakness:o)
Hi, I'd like a scan of the Leever and Camnitz, plz send email to: [url]patricknoll@hotmail.com[/url]
